channel.title: Why is my HP doing this?
channel.description:
I have a 317 PI
When a player starts training melee, a player will get xp for the att, str, or defence skill and not get any HP points, but after a while it will work again and skip right to a higher level?
http://prntscr.com/7bdcru
Any help would be great,
cheers

item.title: Why is my HP doing this?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Gardenn, post:8, topic:551751”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=670666.msg4484974#msg4484974 date=1433439110]

I have already tried that, still nothing

“Nothing” doesn’t tell me anything.

Did it show the values for hp? Did anything happen?..
We cannot help you if you give us nothing to work with.
[/quote]

Still need help with this. What can I provide file wise to help you see this issue out for me, I’m stuck.
Here is a better explanation of the problem as well - My skill counters fixed for every skill (all the xp counters are off, and when gaining levels it doesn’t add the level to the skill tab. It’s as if the players leveling normally, but isn’t displaying the correct levels / xp)[/quote]
Me seeing the file does not tell me what you saw in the debugging.

Is it possible the tab just isn’t refreshing the data?

Gain some XP and then relog, see if it shows in the tab then.

Read full topic
item.source: Why is my HP doing this?

item.dc:creator: @Gardenn Gardenn
item.description:

I have already tried that, still nothing
[/quote]
“Nothing” doesn’t tell me anything.

Did it show the values for hp? Did anything happen?..
We cannot help you if you give us nothing to work with.[/quote]

Still need help with this. What can I provide file wise to help you see this issue out for me, I’m stuck.
Here is a better explanation of the problem as well - My skill counters fixed for every skill (all the xp counters are off, and when gaining levels it doesn’t add the level to the skill tab. It’s as if the players leveling normally, but isn’t displaying the correct levels / xp)

item.title: Why is my HP doing this?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Gardenn, post:3, topic:551751”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=670666.msg4484552#msg4484552 date=1433092471]
Can’t say based on the little information provided…
Check your combat assistant where the code gives your player exp.
[/quote]

Here is a view of my CombatAssistant.java file - http://pastebin.com/TBPXPKAb[/quote]
So did you put a single debug statement in the file to see how much xp was being gave to attack and hp and etc?

You can always put one in the addSkillXP method, and check the id of the skill along with the xp gained…
You’d be looking for the id 3.

Read full topic
item.source: Why is my HP doing this?

item.title: Why is my HP doing this?
item.dc:creator: @Gardenn Gardenn
item.description:
@Gardenn wrote:

My server is having an xp issue, weird things are happening, like the following

Mining - http://prntscr.com/7ck3qz
*this is happening with other random skills (where it shows weird xp that they haven’t gotten)

When a player starts training melee, a player will get xp for the att, str, or defence skill and not get any HP points, but after a while it will work again and skip right to a higher level - http://prntscr.com/7bdcru

Here is a view of my CombatAssistant.java file - http://pastebin.com/TBPXPKAb
Here is a view of my SkillHandler.java file- http://pastebin.com/jt8MZiMH

If you need any other files to help me find this issue I will provide them no problem!

Cheers

ps - will pay if needed

Read full topic
